I work with wood, at it, I'm good.
A carpenter is what I am.
I make toys for girls and boys, also blocks, bats, tops and prams.
Vessels and ladles, cots and cradles, cupboards, tables, rocking chairs,...
...houses, handicrafts, boats and rafts, doors, windows, floors and stairs.
Hammers and saws, chisel and awls are some tools that I use.
I cut and scrape to get the right shape,...
...join parts with glue, nails and screws.
Hooks for wall clocks, doorstops and locks, I fit these for you.
I'm so skilled there's nothing I can't build.
